text: Old logo used prior to 2018 The Latin American Poker Tour (LAPT) was a major poker tour in Latin America, held from 2008 to 2016. The LAPT was sponsored by PokerStars, like its counterparts, the European Poker Tour (2004), Asia Pacific Poker Tour (2007), and North American Poker Tour (2010). ==Season 1== {| class="wikitable" width="70%" |- !width="15%"|Date !!width="15%"| City !!width="35%"| Event !!width="23%"| Winner !!width="12%"| Prize |- | May 3–5, 2008 || Rio de Janeiro || LAPT Rio de Janeiro -
